channel.title: [Oldschool server] Arsenal-RSPS
channel.description:
[img]http://img51.imageshack.us/img51/9067/80832902.png[/img]
[B]Links:[/B]
Website: [URL=http://"http://arsenal-rsps.info"]http://arsenal-rsps.info[/URL]
[SIZE=5]Features:[/SIZE]
- Great Economy. You can earn money by doing skills or killing npc's. - Quests with reqruitments. Total of 12 to choose from. - Balanced exp system, You have to work before you recieve a 99 level. - Great Random Events, A total of 50 events. - Funny Loyality Titles, Just to keep something unique in the game. - Friendly and a nice community, No Corrupt staff. - Custom treasure trial tasks. - Multi Dwarf Cannon, To get your ranged level up a bit easly. - Monthly Community events with every player. - Traveling with: Teleports, Ship and Flying. - Item Reqruitments to wear items. - Old school based server. To bring back some memory's. - Great Training spots. - And a alot of content, you can't get bored.

item.title: [Oldschool server] Arsenal-RSPS
item.dc:creator: @vince127ha vince127ha
item.description:
@vince127ha wrote:

Links:

Website: http://arsenal-rsps.info

[SIZE=5]Features:[/SIZE]

  • Great Economy. You can earn money by doing skills or killing npc’s.
  • Quests with reqruitments. Total of 12 to choose from.
  • Balanced exp system, You have to work before you recieve a 99 level.
  • Great Random Events, A total of 50 events.
  • Funny Loyality Titles, Just to keep something unique in the game.
  • Friendly and a nice community, No Corrupt staff.
  • Custom treasure trial tasks.
  • Multi Dwarf Cannon, To get your ranged level up a bit easly.
  • Monthly Community events with every player.
  • Traveling with: Teleports, Ship and Flying.
  • Item Reqruitments to wear items.
  • Old school based server. To bring back some memory’s.
  • Great Training spots.
  • And a alot of content, you can’t get bored.
